payload.name: remote-attestation
payload.title: Remote attestation: trust becomes a verifiable claim
payload.formal: prove to a verifier that the prover is running approved code/config, typically using TPM quotes or enclave attestation.
payload.apm2_mapping: any node receiving authority (capabilities, keys, deployment power) must present attestation *before* delegation. This aligns with APM2’s “fail-closed” posture: if attestation missing/unverifiable, deny.
